name: ai-shifu
description: AI-Shifu is a guide powered by LLM. Unlike other human-led chatbots, AI-Shifu is AI-led chat flow, and humans just need to follow.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:cook-web"
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:cook-web
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:cook-web
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd src/web && pnpm install && cd ../cook-web && npm install
scripts.docker:dev: cd docker && docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up -d

author: AI-Shifu Team
